column4: Traffic;PHNOM PENH------: A widowed man died after getting drunk and falling down on the railway track before he was struck by a train in Kambol district.------The man
column8: Prey Veng province. The victim has been widowed for five years and has three children he left in his home village when he left to work in Phnom Penh.------He was often drunk and hung around the railway tracks. At 2 am on January 28th
column9: a train running into Phnom Penh hit him
column10: but the body was not discovered until the next  morning at 7 o’clock.------Authorities went to the scene and concluded the man had been hit by a train. The body parts were collected and handed to family. ------AREY
